refnamediv.refpurpose: convert a BRL BW(5) format image to a PNG (Portable Network Graphics) format

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: bw-png converts a BRL BW(5) format file to a PNG format file on the standard output. The PNG file created will be an Gray scale file with a bit-depth of 8 and a file gamma of 1.0.

listitem.para: autosize the input file to determine file image height and width
tells bw-png that the input is file_height scanlines tall
sets both the width and the height for the input to be squaresize
tells bw-png that the input is file_width pixels wide
